unit.utterance: maumwi gabaw gaw ningchyang masum a lam re.
unit.utterance_translation: The title of this story is a story about three servants.

unit.utterance: dai lani mi na ahkying aten hta e da
unit.utterance_translation: One day, it's said,

unit.utterance: ndai la langai mi gaw shi gaw nchyang masum shaw da ai saw da ai
unit.utterance_translation: one man called three servants, it's said.

unit.utterance: hkauna galaw na matu saw da yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (He) called (them) to cultivate his paddy field and

unit.utterance: lani mi gaw dai
unit.utterance_translation: one day

unit.utterance: dai nchyang dai
unit.utterance_translation: the servant

unit.utterance: hkauna madu wa i dai madu wa gaw dai nchyang masum hpe dai mam hkauga sa gat na matu shangun dat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: the owner of the paddy field sent the three servants to go to the paddy and sow seeds.

unit.utterance: mam nli ni ma jaw dat
unit.utterance_translation: (He) gave them paddy seeds.

unit.utterance: gumra ma gumra hte rai na she hkau na de sa na
unit.utterance_translation: (They) went to the paddy field with a horse and

unit.utterance: ndai hkau ga sa gat shangun ai shaloi she
unit.utterance_translation: when (he) made them to go to the paddy and sow seeds

unit.utterance: dai la masum dai ni gaw loi mi nchyang re nga yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: these three were servants and

unit.utterance: nchyang madu na dai hku madu myit nan nrawng ai sha
unit.utterance_translation: without having the mind as the owner of the paddy

unit.utterance: shanhte gaw nchyang myit hte sha re nga yang she
unit.utterance_translation: they only have the mind as servants and

unit.utterance: dai hku shanhte kam ai hku bungli hpe mung atsawm rai galaw ya mayu ai myit n rawng ai.
unit.utterance_translation: they did not have the mind to want to do the job well like that.

unit.utterance: dai she lani mi gaw jan grai ja
unit.utterance_translation: Then, one day, it was very hot.

unit.utterance: dai shani she jan grai ja taw na hku nga.
unit.utterance_translation: That day, it was very hot.

unit.utterance: dai shaloi she shanhte gaw langai mi gaw tsun wa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, one of them said.

unit.utterance: jan grai ja ai law.
unit.utterance_translation: "It is very hot."

unit.utterance: ndai kaw jahkring mi naw hkring la ga rai na she
unit.utterance_translation: "Let's take a rest here for a while," and

unit.utterance: hkring taw nga she
unit.utterance_translation: (they) were taking a rest and

unit.utterance: dai kaw hkring ai.
unit.utterance_translation: they took a rest.

unit.utterance: shanhte gaw hkring hkring jahta chyai jahta chyai rai she
unit.utterance_translation: They chatted a lot and

unit.utterance: loi mi bai pu rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (they) got a little tired and

unit.utterance: ya hkring gaw yup mat wa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: (they) slept for a while.

unit.utterance: yup malap mat rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (They) slept and

unit.utterance: jahkring gaw dai hkauna madu wa gaw sa wa sai.
unit.utterance_translation: After a while, the owner of the paddy came.

unit.utterance: sa wa yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (He) came and

unit.utterance: shi na nchyang ni wa yup mahka taw nga
unit.utterance_translation: his servants were sleeping opening their mouths.

unit.utterance: yup gawk she di rai hkra yup mahka taw nga yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (They) were sleeping opening their mouths to the extent that they snored and

unit.utterance: shi gaw masin mung yu pawt ai hte
unit.utterance_translation: he [= the owner] got angry and

unit.utterance: yau sai shanhte ba yang gaw yup nga sanu ga nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: "OK, let them sleep if they are tired," and
unit.add_comments: =sa-nu=ga as a whole functions as a jussive mood marker, where the agent appears as a subject.

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai mam nli hpe la di na she
unit.utterance_translation: he took the paddy seeds and

unit.utterance: shi gaw hkawm mat wa ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he walked away.

unit.utterance: hkawm mat wa na she
unit.utterance_translation: (He) walked away and

unit.utterance: bai sa hkauga ni sa gat kau tawn da rai na she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) sow the paddy seeds and

unit.utterance: bai wa rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) went back and

unit.utterance: wa na nga taw yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) went back and stayed (at his house) and

unit.utterance: ora masum gaw yup rawt ai hte
unit.utterance_translation: the three got up and

unit.utterance: mam nli mung n nga taw rai yang
unit.utterance_translation: there were no paddy seeds and

unit.utterance: shanhte gaw hkrit mat na hku rai nga.
unit.utterance_translation: they got afraid.

unit.utterance: koi ya madu wa hpe kaning hku tsun dan na re ma.
unit.utterance_translation: "Oh, how should we tell it to the owner?"

unit.utterance: anhte hpa n chye galaw sai gaw nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: "We can do nothing now," (they) said and

unit.utterance: shanhte gaw dai hku rai na nga.
unit.utterance_translation: they stayed there like that.

unit.utterance: shanhte gaw dan jang gaw anhte ni madu hpe ndai hku wa tsun ga.
unit.utterance_translation: They said "Then, let's tell the owner like this."

unit.utterance: anhte ni gan hkring nga laman e ndai gumra sha kau ya sai ngu tsun ga nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: "Let's say that "When we were taking a rest, this horse ate (the seeds),"" and

unit.utterance: dai hku myit ai majaw
unit.utterance_translation: Because they thought like that

unit.utterance: shanhte ni gaw shana de loi mi nga la
unit.utterance_translation: they stayed there for a while in the night and

unit.utterance: jan du hkra nga la na she
unit.utterance_translation: (they) stayed there until the sun goes down and

unit.utterance: wa rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (they) went back and

unit.utterance: ora madu wa mung ndai ni gaw ngai hpe gara hku wa masu sha na i.
unit.utterance_translation: The owner said [in his mind], "How will they lie to me?"

unit.utterance: shanhte tengman ai wa tsun na kun nga na
unit.utterance_translation: "Will they tell the truth?" and

unit.utterance: shi gaw chyam ai hte she
unit.utterance_translation: he tried (them) and

unit.utterance: nanhte ni hkauga gara hku rai sai rai.
unit.utterance_translation: "You, how is the paddy field now?"

unit.utterance: gat ai gaw masan gaw sa ai i nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: "Is the sowing going well?" and

unit.utterance: e madu e grai gaw tawngban sai.
unit.utterance_translation: "Oh, owner, we apologize to you."

unit.utterance: daini anhte ni jahkring mi hkring ai laman wa
unit.utterance_translation: "Today, when we were taking a rest for a while,

unit.utterance: ndai gumra wa anhte na mam nli mahkra sha kau ya sai nga dai hku nga na tsun rai yang she
unit.utterance_translation: this horse ate all our paddy seeds," (they) said and

unit.utterance: dan yang she dai madu wa bungli galaw kang nka ai hta sha n ga na she
unit.utterance_translation: then, the owner, (because the servents not only didn't do their job) but also (they) were not reliable in doing the job

unit.utterance: shi gaw grau pawt mayu mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he got angry much more.

unit.utterance: masu sha ai majaw i.
unit.utterance_translation: It is because (they) lied (to him), OK?

unit.utterance: masu sha ai majaw grau pawt mayu mat na
unit.utterance_translation: Because (they) lied (to him), (he) got angry and

unit.utterance: shanhte hpe dai nchyang kaw na shapraw kau ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (he) took them away from the job.

unit.utterance: dai le i nkang ka ai hpe tsun mayu ai re.
unit.utterance_translation: This story wants to tell about unreliable people.

unit.utterance: chyeju kaba sai.
unit.utterance_translation: Thank you.
